## Interactive Map

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

if(!require("leaflet")){
  options(repos=c(CRAN="https://cloud.r-project.org"))
  install.packages("leaflet")
  stopifnot(require("leaflet"))
}

baruch_longitude <- -73.98333
baruch_latitude  <- 40.75028

leaflet() |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, zoom=17) |>
  addPopups(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, 
            "I am a Master's student at <b>Baruch College</b>!")
```

## Want to test your data science knowledge? Try this quiz!

```{r}
cat("Welcome to the Data Science Quiz! ðŸŽ¯\n")
cat("Answer the following questions. Type the letter (a, b, c, or d) and press Enter.\n\n")

# Questions and answers
questions <- list(
  list(
    q = "1) Which of these is NOT a supervised learning algorithm?",
    options = c("a) Linear Regression", "b) K-Means Clustering", 
                "c) Decision Tree", "d) Random Forest"),
    answer = "b"
  ),
  list(
    q = "2) What does the 'tidyverse' primarily help with in R?",
    options = c("a) Machine learning", "b) Web scraping", 
                "c) Data manipulation & visualization", "d) Creating R packages"),
    answer = "c"
  ),
  list(
    q = "3) In a dataset, what does a 'factor' represent in R?",
    options = c("a) A continuous numeric variable",
                "b) A categorical variable",
                "c) A missing value",
                "d) A probability distribution"),
    answer = "b"
  ),
  list(
    q = "4) Which metric is best for evaluating a classification model with imbalanced classes?",
    options = c("a) Accuracy", "b) Precision", "c) Recall", "d) F1 Score"),
    answer = "d"
  ),
  list(
    q = "5) What is the purpose of cross-validation?",
    options = c("a) To create more training data",
                "b) To evaluate model performance on unseen data",
                "c) To balance the dataset",
                "d) To speed up training"),
    answer = "b"
  )
)

score <- 0

# Quiz loop
for (i in seq_along(questions)) {
  cat("\n", questions[[i]]$q, "\n")
  cat(paste(questions[[i]]$options, collapse = "\n"), "\n")
  ans <- tolower(trimws(readline("Your answer: ")))
  
  if (ans == questions[[i]]$answer) {
    cat("âœ… Correct!\n")
    score <- score + 1
  } else {
    cat("âŒ Incorrect. The correct answer was",
        toupper(questions[[i]]$answer), "\n")
  }
}

cat("\nðŸŽ‰ Quiz complete! Your score:", score, "out of", length(questions), "\n")

if (score == length(questions)) {
  cat("Excellent! Youâ€™re a Data Science star! ðŸŒŸ\n")
} else if (score >= 3) {
  cat("Good job! Keep practicing your data skills. ðŸ’ª\n")
} else {
  cat("Keep learningâ€”data science is a journey! ðŸ“š\n")
}
```
